forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. West northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The night in Downtown San Francisco unfurls under a cloak of mostly clear skies, a serene backdrop for the city that never truly sleeps. The temperature dips gently towards the mid-forties, carried along by a crisp west-northwest breeze that whispers of the day's promises. As the early morning hours blend into the dawn, expect the sun to rise with confidence, illuminating the horizon. By midday, the warmth of the sun will tug on the cool air, settling around the mid-fifties — a fleeting warmth that will, as afternoon approaches, coax cool breezes. 

With clarity stretching towards the Golden Gate, today's outlook is one of resplendence punctuated by the occasional playful gust, lending itself to a refreshing agility as one navigates the streets. Dress in layers — a light coat or sweater will allow you to embrace both the chill of morning and the sun’s eventual glow. Consider a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to one of the city’s cozy cafés, where the aroma of fresh coffee dances in the air. The city's charm, punctuated by the gentle sounds of morning activity and distant laughter, invites you to savor this vibrant, albeit brisk, day.
